name: More 'Twilight Zone' Online Quiz | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: In one episode, Anne Francis has a secret identity. What is it?
questions.explanation:
She's a mannequin.

	She comes to life for a little 'vacation'.

questions.text: Mickey Rooney makes a wish and has it granted. What does he wish to be?
questions.explanation:
Bigger.

	The irony is that he goes from being a suspended jockey at the start of the show to being reinstated at the show's end - after he has had his wish for height granted.

questions.text: Dick York stars in an episode about a soldier with a special ability. What is it?
questions.correct: He has in certain instances been able to tell who is about to die
options: He is able to travel through time
questions.explanation:
He has in certain instances been able to tell who is about to die.

	He's a soldier who can look at your face and tell if you're going to die. Then, he looks in the mirror ... (York is not the fellow with the special ability.)

questions.text: State police investigate the apparent landing of a spaceship and conclude that one of several bus passengers must be an alien. Where are these people during the questioning by the police?
By whom is Inger Stevens bothered as she drives across the country to return home?
A man and his new wife encounter a curious fortune telling machine while they are stranded in a small town with car trouble. Who plays the man?
questions.explanation:
William Shatner.

	Shatner also played the nervous plane passenger who spots a creature on the plane's wing. Ebsen played a person with mind-over-matter powers. McCarthy playeed a history professor who lived forever. Weaver appeared as a prisoner who kept re-experiencing the same events.

questions.text: A modern jet flies into the past - then tries to come back to the present, but doesn't quite make it. How far back into the present does the plane get?
questions.explanation:
Early 20th Century.

	Back to the dinosaurs, then back - but not quite all the way - to the 1939 World's Fair. Good episode.

questions.text: A World War I pilot flies into modern times and then goes back to his own time to correct a wrong. What does he want to correct?
questions.explanation:
His act of cowardice.

	He ran out on a buddy during an aerial dogfight.

questions.text: Cliff Robertson plays an entertainer with a problem. What sort of entertainment does he provide?
In an Adam-and Eve story, Elizabeth Montgomery plays the woman. Who plays the man?
questions.explanation:
Charles Bronson.

	The others are all in different episodes.
